SELECT s.seller_num, s.seller_storeName, s.seller_name, DATE_FORMAT(o.order_day, '%Y-%m') as order_month, FORMAT(SUM(o.order_pay), 0) AS total_revenue, FORMAT(floor(sum(o.order_pay) * 0.05), 0) as fee, FORMAT(SUM(o.order_pay) - floor(sum(o.order_pay) * 0.05), 0) as settlement_amount, st.settlement_yn FROM seller s LEFT JOIN item i ON s.seller_num = i.seller_num LEFT JOIN orders o ON i.item_num = o.item_num LEFT JOIN settlement st ON s.seller_num = st.seller_num WHERE s.seller_num != 'admin' GROUP BY s.seller_num, s.seller_id, s.seller_name, order_month, st.settlement_yn ORDER BY order_month;
